name: Parallax
desc: The behavior whereby a component moves at a speed different from the scroll speed.

items.name: type
items.desc: This behavior always has the type parallax.

items.name: factor
items.desc: The speed of the component, as a factor of the scroll speed.The value of factor must be between 0.5 and 2.0. Values outside this range will be reset to the minimum or maximum value.The parallax factor 1.0 is equal to the scroll speed. A factor lower than 1.0 makes the component move more slowly than the scrolling speed. A factor higher than 1.0 makes the component move more quickly than the scrolling speed.
